intro_only_event_matsuba_solobattle/4901:
Hey there. How are you doing? We’re doing great
ourselves! Haven’t lost a Pokémon battle yet!

Hm? What’s my secret to victory? I guess it’s the
secret training I've been doing all my life.

My training is designed with Ghost-type users in
mind, but you can join me, if you’d like. Feel free
to invite some other sync pairs to join us, too!

It’s important to interact with many different
people and Pokémon. That way, we train our
hearts as well as our bodies!
intro_only_event_matsuba_solobattle/6001:
Today looks like another
good day for training.
Come join me whenever you’re ready to train.

Either way, I will continue my training until I
discover a new future for me!
